info.name: Live Data Ledger API
info.description:
Create and manage Live Data ledgers, including adding contacts and getting updates to employment.

Contact Support:
 Name: LiveData Support
 Email: support@livedatatechnologies.com

request.description:
Get a list of all contact import jobs for this ledger
Role(s) required: viewer, editor, admin

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

item.name: Get list of contacts from ledger

url.raw: {{baseUrl}}/orgs/:orgId/ledgers/:ledgerId/contacts?company=reprehenderit e&domain=reprehenderit e&title=reprehenderit e&name=reprehenderit e&sortBy=-name&limit=27178667&offset=27178667&fromDate=reprehenderit e&endDate=reprehenderit e&isVerified=false&referenceId=reprehenderit e&importCompany=reprehenderit e&importTitle=reprehenderit e

request.description:
Asynchronously import contacts via json body. This API call is limited to adding only 25 contacts. For importing larger sets of contacts, use the contacts/imports endpoint. The response from this call is an ImportID which can be checked to determined the status of the import.
Role(s) required: editor, admin

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: One or more contacts specified in the body does not contain the required fields, or contains invalid fields
